isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - ELECTRONIC CONTROL MODULE (ECM) POWER SUPPLY - TROUBLESHOOTING

svcproc.title: TROUBLESHOOTING
svcproc.para: If either Flash Code 112 or 113 is active, refer to CTS- 5000 Master Service Manual for information on troubleshooting electrical and charging systems.

If flash code 626 is active, the voltage at pins 21,22 and 41 of the ECM should be monitored while looking for an intermittent connection in the power feed wiring. The Electronic Service Tool may be used to indicate any fault codes as well as displaying the voltage as measured by the ECM.
